chapter.title: Running the Maintenance Interface (zebraidx)
chapter.para: The following is a complete reference to the command line interface to the zebraidx application.

Commands
update directory
Update the register with the files contained in directory. If no directory is provided, a list of files is read from stdin. See .
delete directory
Remove the records corresponding to the files found under directory from the register.
commit
Write the changes resulting from the last update commands to the register. This command is only available if the use of shadow register files is enabled (see ).
